title: When one report just isn't enough

body:
Sometimes, you'll see a couple of friends screwing around with a game right from the start as they refuse to go to an available position and you know the game's going to be interesting.

Cut to 20 minutes later and with seemingly no idea of how to make progress in the game, you'll see those same two friends just wandering around doing... something, while the other players are trying to be useful.

And then, by the time the game has ended, somehow in a victory against all the odds, the obsessive-compulsive number collector and his mate really start to ramp up the stakes in the after-game lobby.

Brilliant.
